ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( ISCHANGED( Status__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"In Progress"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Completed"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Cancelled")
), $Profile.Name <> "PB Listing Manager", $Profile.Name <> "PB Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "PB Superuser", $Profile.Name <> "Content Creator" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Listing Manager move the status beyond Open
